title: The Edinburgh gazetteer, or geographical dictionary ...
snippet: The mostprominent feature in this district is MountCarmel, extending along the gulf of Acre.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Thou shalt be a queen, Rebecca—on MountCarmel shall we pitch the throne which my valourwill gain for you, and I will exchange my longdesired baton tor a sceptre."

title: World: round it and over it ... letters ... With illustrations ... Second edition
author: Glass, Chester.
snippet: Then down through the Holy Land on horseback,sleeping at monasteries and visiting Sidon, Tyre, MountCarmel, Nazareth, the home of Christ; Galilee, the sceneof His greatest works; Mount Tabor, Nabulus, the peculiar home of a peculiar people, and, finally, Jerusalem,the loadstone of pilgrims from every clime.
